snippet: The computer model identifies a range of factors related to suicide that could allow doctors to follow high-risk soldiers closely and take preventive measures.
abstract: Study in journal JAMA Psychiatry suggests military doctors could reduce suicides among soldiers with psychiatric conditions by using new screening system; computer model identifies a range of factors related to suicide that could allow doctors to follow high-risk soldiers closely and take preventive measures.
lead_paragraph: The computer model identifies a range of factors related to suicide that could allow doctors to follow high-risk soldiers closely and take preventive measures.

headline.main: Risk Model Seen as Reducing Military Suicides
headline.print_headline: Risk Model Seen as Reducing Military Suicides

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
